### Range

### Variability

The amount of individual observation or set of observations fluctuates about the mean or center of set of data

Deviation = distance that a value is from the mean

#### Sample Variance

![](images/clipboard-3891105620.png)

### Mean Absolute Deviation (MAD)

![](images/clipboard-2110179451.png)

### Standard Deviation

The square root of the variance

## Empirical Rule

The variability of a set of measurements for a bell-shaped distribution

68-95-99.7

### Chebyshev's Theorem

General rule that describes the variability of any set of data regardless of the shape of its distribution

![](images/clipboard-3495769771.png)

## Coefficient of Variation

Compares the variation in data sets

![](images/clipboard-296307634.png)
